messages.message:
Hi Team - just posting some notes for visibility I've made over the course of last week of so while implementing FinTrU as a commercial customer:
• Make it abundantly clear that reasoning is better for anything that isn't a really simple field extraction
• For anything that isn't a deterministic answer, educate customer that models aren't deterministic and output will vary
• Make the basic features of the platform abundantly clear how to use before going into specific prompt engineering enablement
The customer wasn’t able to discover project sharing on their own, even though they are a commercial customer
Great feedback Ben, thanks for sharing the learnings here

"reasoning is better for anything that isn't a really simple field extraction"

can you give a few examples on non-simple field extractions?
Thanks for sharing this! Since project sharing isn't supported yet, it makes sense they can't discover it :slightly_smiling_face: they'll be able to do this once 47 is pushed to prod
